description.value:
Your understanding of your quarry is so complete that you can easily guide your allies to exploit it. Each day when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.rr-playtest-actions.Item.Wagb9XE34NpQQ8yy]{Reinforce your Arsenal}, choose one of the following benefits; you can choose only a benefit associated with a signature tool you have. When you Share Insight, your allies gain the chosen benefit for 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.rr-playtest-class-features.Item.Nl1Aqj6JTdMv0qbB]{Bloodseeking Blade} Allies within 30 feet of you ignore 3 points of your quarry's resistance to any damage they deal.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.rr-playtest-class-features.Item.iihaKfTGSfA3kExA]{Chymist's Vials} Allies within 30 feet of you gain low-light vision, or darkvision if they already had low-light vision, and can detect your quarry as a precise sense within 30 feet.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.rr-playtest-class-features.Item.6Tvz8UCMxDx0nxHa]{Consecrated Panoply} Allies within 30 feet of you gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against your quarry.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.rr-playtest-class-features.Item.e2yHoiqZP7PM22Cq]{Warded Mail} Allies within 30 feet of you have resistance 5 to damage dealt by your quarry.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.rr-playtest-effects.Item.Xwo4jfTkwTLW2RHQ]{Effect: Share Insight}
